get.summary: Retrieves a specific Transfer agent fund shareclass record
get.description: Retrieves a specific Transfer agent fund shareclass record

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

delete.summary: Updates a specific Transfer agent fund shareclass record for the specified parent
delete.description: Updates a specific Transfer agent fund shareclass record for the specified parent

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

reference.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the record

entityType.description: Identifies the entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

internalId.description: Internal identifier of the records.  Generated by the system during POST and can be used for other operations

promoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

promoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

parent.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the parent record, if the current record belongs to sub entities

parentEntityType.description: Identifies the parent entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

parentInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the parent record

parentExternalId.description: External identifier of the parent record

parentPromoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

parentPromoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

shareclass.description: Contains individual attributes of the Shareclass entity

shareClassCode.description: The share class code. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TPART.

dividendType.description: It specifies if the dividend is distributed or reinvested. Allowed values: D(Dividend distributed), R(Reinvestment). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TDIVIDE.

quantityDecimals.description: Number of decimal places in the client share quantity calculation. Possible Values: 0 (Integer), 1(1 Decimal- places), 2 (2 Decimal places) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table CODE_ARR.

registerValueDateCode.description: The exception value date for all operation codes of the share class and TA fund. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_REGVDC.

dailyDividendFlag.description: Flag allows to specify the TA fund (with fund type as 0006 - Money Market - Stable NAV Fund) is daily dividend fund. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).  If the flag is set N, then the TA fund will be considered as normal dividend

distributionType.description: Dividend distribution type code for the fund and share class. Allowed values 0000(Default payout exception allowed), 0001(Default reinvest exception allowed), 0002(Default payout no exception), 0004(Default reinvest no exception). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TAMUT01.

fundMessage.description: The fund warning message which will be displayed in the order entry screen. Allowed values are from the list of messages from MFGI table TA_FUNDMSG.

orderBlockedFlag.description: Flag allows to block the Fund Share class for transactions. Allowed values: Y(to block), N(to unblock).

cdscBucketFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the bucketing principle to switches and transfers placed in the share class. The flag can be enabled only for share class having the flag Use CDSC set. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

cdscFlag.description: Flag enables the CDSC functionality for the fund share class. Allowed values : Y(to enable), N(to disable).

kiidTaCompliance.description: It specifies the type of  KIID TA control at order entry for the shareclass. For example: 0000(No control), 0001(Standing instruction), 0002(Order check)etc.

dealType.description: Deal type code for Cash handling at Shareclass level. For example: 0001(Contractual), 0002(Semi-Contractual), 0003(Actual) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_DEAL.

numberOfDays.description: It specifies the number of days between trade date and value date for the fund.

historicalTransferFlag.description: Flag allows to activate the functionality of placing transfer with history. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No). If the share class is a simple CDSC share class ( Use CDSC flag is set as Y/ CDSC buckets flag set as N) , the history is not kept in case of transfer.

mnavFlag.description: Flag allows to in scope the Multiple NAV functionality for fund shareclass.  Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).

batchBlockedFlag.description: Flag allows to block the simulation and batch process of orders in the shareclasses as the NAV price required for these processes is blocked. Allowed values: Y (to block), N(to unblock).

manualCollapseFlag.description: Flag allows to manually collapse the series of shares instead of automatically by the system. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).

collapseRecipientFlag.description: Flag allows specify the series as the lead series for the end of period merge. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

noPriceRequiredFlag.description: Flag allows to specify that price is not required for the series.  Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).

collapseRecipientShareClassCode.description: Flag allows specify the series as the lead series for the end of period merge. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

erisaCheck.description: ERISA check that needs to be performed in the order level for the share class. Allowed values: 0000(Warning message), 0001(Blocking message), 0002(No check).

cdscCalculationPriceBasis.description: To define the method of calculation of CDSC amount for the share class. Allowed values: 0000(Lower of cost vs market), 0001(Cost (purchase price)),0002(Market(current price)).

rolloverTaFundId.description: The rollover TA Fund Internal ID for the CDSC share class.

rolloverShareClassCode.description: The rollover share class for the CDSC share class. Allowed values are from the list of share class codes in MFGI.

ageingPeriodInMonths.description: Ageing period (in months) for the CDSC share class

usPersonControl.description: It specifies the restrictions of transactions for US persons. For example: 0000(None), 0001(warning for debit transacions on US persons) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_US_CTRL. The field is related to US tax.

erisaClassFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the custody settlement ERISA for the transactions created in the share class and for all underlying transaction created from this transaction.  Allowed values: Y (to enable),N (to disable)

glFlowId.description: General Ledger Flow ID code linked to TA Fund.  Allowed values are from the list of  GL flow IDs defined in GL flow definition in MFGI.

interfaceBlocked.description: Flag allows to block the Fund Share class for interface transactions. Allowed values: Y(to block), N(to unblock).

lastNavFlag.description: Flag allows to block the NAV to be inserted for the shareclass. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No). When the flag is set Y, the share class will be removed from the NAV Completeness check.

negativeDailyDividendFlag.description: Flag allows accepting the negative daily dividend rates for the fund share class. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).  It is possible to enable the flag only when the flag Daily Dividend is set Y.

ukEqualizationRatesFlag.description: Flag allows to in scope of Equalization calculation for the shareclass.  Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).

monthEndYieldRate.description: Flag enables the shareclass to receive Month End yield rates. Allowed values: Y (to enable), N(to disable).

fundTradingDeskProcess.description: It specifies if the fund share class is in scope of Fund trading desk or Hedge FX or not in scope of both. This is a mandatory field when flag Adv. fund trading desk is ticked at application level. The values at this field Fund tdsk.process is dependent upon the values at the field ÜFund tdsk. and the ÜFund tdsk. model at MF fund level.

restrictedFlag.description: Flag allows to differentiate the share classes from being normal share class vs restricted share class and this flag will also help for reporting certain transactions. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).

imaShareFlag.description: Flag allows checking if an IMA has been signed by the investor for the fund and share class in which the deal is placed. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

blanketWaiverFlag.description: Flag to enable blanket waiver for transactions that do not meet the minimum investment limits. Allowed values: Y (to enable),N (to disable), or Null(=N).

mimumumLimitsMonitoringFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the minimum limit tracking for the confirmed orders. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N(for No).

privateEquityPricingMethod.description: The pricing method of Private Equity or Real Estate fund. Allowed values: 0000(No commitemet), 0001 (Fully paid units), 0002(Partly paid units). This field is mandatory for TA fund Type- PEF or REIF and Management Type is  PART at MF Fund level.

capitalTrancheFlag.description: Flag allows to specify that the share class works by tranche of committed capital. Allowed values: Y(for yes), N(for no). The flag can be enabled only if PE/RE pricing method in 0001 or 0003. If the flag is set as Y, the tranche number will become mandatory at the commitment and capital call/drawdown processing.

initialBoxDate.description: Initial Box date on which Box is created with status Open and an initial box number. The field is mandatory for the funds inscope of box management.

noWrapProductFlag.description: Flag allows to block the Share Class for selection at Product and will be considered as excluded where @@@@ is selected. The flag is related to UK functionality. Allowed values: Y(to block), N(to unblock).

mifidControl.description: It specifies the MIFID contorl for share class. The field is mandatory. Allowed values: 0000(Not applicable), 0001 (Inscope only warning). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MIFID_CTL.
